'''Siyu's Xiao Lantern''' is an [[Event Item]] given by [[Siyu]] during the {{Quest|Hammer and Wrench}}.

Siyu wants to give [[Wrench Wang]] a lantern as a token of thanks for all the help he has given her since her childhood, hoping he will have free time soon. Due to housework keeping her busy, Siyu asks the [[Traveler]] a favor to give it to Wrench Wang.
